idea-plugin.name: DroidForge: Clean Architecture Generator
idea-plugin.description:
DroidForge: Say Goodbye to Boilerplate!

Are you tired of the repetitive task of creating dozens of files and folders every time you start a new feature in your Android or KMM project? DroidForge is the professional solution to automate your workflow, letting you focus on what truly matters: building amazing experiences.

What It Does

With a single action, DroidForge generates a complete, robust, and scalable feature structure based on Clean Architecture principles. It's the perfect tool for maintaining consistency and accelerating your development.

Generated File Structure

For a feature named "MyFeature", you get this entire, compilable structure instantly.

Fully Customizable

A simple dialog lets you configure the generation process:

  • Target Platform: Instantly scaffold for Native Android or Kotlin Multiplatform (KMM).
  • Dependency Injection: Choose between Hilt and Koin.
  • Navigation Style: Select your preferred navigation setup (Nav2 or Nav3).

How to Use

Right-click on a package -> New -> DroidForge: Clean Architecture Generator.

action.description: Creates a new feature following Clean Architecture principles.
